name: Global Caloric Solutions, Inc.
description: Global Caloric Solutions, Inc. is an innovative leader in the food technology sector, specializing in the development and distribution of advanced caloric management systems. Founded in 2010, GCAL aims to revolutionize the way individuals and businesses manage dietary intake through cutting-edge technology and proprietary algorithms. The company’s flagship product, the Caloric Tracker, integrates seamlessly with mobile devices, enabling users to monitor their caloric consumption in real-time. In addition to its consumer products, GCAL collaborates with restaurants and food service providers to implement solutions that optimize menu offerings based on nutritional data and consumer preferences. With a commitment to promoting healthier lifestyles, GCAL invests in research and development to create new functionalities that enhance user experience and dietary planning. The company also emphasizes sustainability, sourcing ingredients from responsible suppliers and reducing food waste through smart inventory management. GCAL's mission is to empower people to make informed dietary choices, ultimately contributing to improved public health outcomes.

seo.meta_title: Global Caloric Solutions, Inc. | Innovative Food Technology
seo.meta_description: Explore Global Caloric Solutions, Inc., a leader in food technology and caloric management systems. Discover how GCAL empowers healthier dietary choices.

faq.question: What is Global Caloric Solutions known for?
faq.answer: Global Caloric Solutions is known for its innovative caloric management systems and dietary tracking products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Global Caloric Solutions?
faq.answer: Jessica Hartman is the CEO of Global Caloric Solutions, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Global Caloric Solutions headquartered?
faq.answer: Global Caloric Solutions is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.question: What are Global Caloric Solutions' main products?
faq.answer: GCAL's main products include the Caloric Tracker and Menu Optimization Software.

faq.question: When was Global Caloric Solutions founded?
faq.answer: Global Caloric Solutions was founded in 2010.
